Functions

p_alias(p)

alias : WORD AS WORD | object_attribute_lookup AS WORD

p_binary_operator(p)

binary_operator : EQUALS | LESSTHAN | GREATERTHAN

p_cypher(p)

cypher : query

p_incomplete_relationship_chain(p)

incomplete_relationship_chain : node left_right | node right_left | incomplete_relationship_chain node left_right | incomplete_relationship_chain node right_left

p_left_right(p)

left_right : DASH relationship DASH GREATERTHAN

p_literal(p)

literal : INTEGER | FLOAT | DQUOTE WORD DQUOTE

p_mapping_list(p)

mapping_list : WORD COLON literal | mapping_list COMMA WORD COLON literal

p_match_pattern(p)

match_pattern : MATCH node | MATCH relationship_chain_list | MATCH relationship_chain_list where | MATCH node where

p_name_label(p)

name_label : WORD | WORD COLON WORD

p_node(p)

node : LPAREN name_label RPAREN | LPAREN name_label LCURLY mapping_list RCURLY RPAREN

p_object_attribute_lookup(p)

object_attribute_lookup : WORD DOT WORD

p_predicate(p)

predicate : object_attribute_lookup binary_operator literal | object_attribute_lookup binary_operator object_attribute_lookup

p_projection(p)

projection : object_attribute_lookup | alias | projection COMMA alias | projection COMMA object_attribute_lookup

p_query(p)

query : match_pattern return

p_relationship(p)

relationship : LSQUARE WORD RSQUARE | LSQUARE name_label RSQUARE

p_relationship_chain(p)

relationship_chain : incomplete_relationship_chain node

p_relationship_chain_list(p)

relationship_chain_list : relationship_chain | relationship_chain_list COMMA relationship_chain

p_return(p)

return : RETURN projection

p_right_left(p)

right_left : LESSTHAN DASH relationship DASH

p_string(p)

string : DQUOTE WORD DQUOTE

p_where(p)

where : WHERE predicate | where COMMA predicate
